attributes.action: BREXIT IS REAL - WE HAVE 4 GREAT NEW LEADERS TO SEE US THROUGH THIS
attributes.additional_details: Brexit is a fact. If reversed it will destroy our last chance to fix the faults within the society we all live in. The reason we have a Leave vote is because our current political leaders do not have a clue. But, the leader of every party in Scotland is compassionate, honest and committed. 3 of 4 them are women. Scotland is very lucky to have them. But now is the time to throw away the old school: Cameron, Johnson, Corbyn, etc - they are the anachronisms... Challenge Sturgeon to go for it!
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon: PM, Ruth Davidson: Conservative, Kezia Dugdale: Labour, Willie Rennie: Liberal. These people are far more competent than any in Westminster. Challenge them to be responsible for fixing it - they all say they serve the people, and they are the real talent in UK politics...
